title: Episode 189: Architect Of Your Own Life with Phoebe Robinson
itunes:title: Episode 189: Architect Of Your Own Life with Phoebe Robinson
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree manage their to-do lists and learn the science of accomplishing things. Then, Phoebe Robinson (Please Don’t Sit On My Bed In Your Outside Clothes) joins the pod to talk about how self-care is more than a candle and therapy isn’t a notebo...
description:
Kate and Doree manage their to-do lists and learn the science of accomplishing things. Then, Phoebe Robinson (Please Don’t Sit On My Bed In Your Outside Clothes) joins the pod to talk about how self-care is more than a candle and therapy isn’t a notebook, what she does to keep writing in the midst of her busy schedule, and why she can’t understand why some people think washing their hands ends with the pandemic.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter at forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
